--- DateTime: 2021/12/8 0:03
--- 转向
---@class bt_ac_turn : IAction
local bt_ac_turn = SimpleClassUtil:class(IAction)

function bt_ac_turn:initData(data)

end
---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
function bt_ac_turn:doAction(blackBoard,contextManager)
    local old_orientation = blackBoard._orientation
    local new_orientation = old_orientation == Enum_Battle.Orientation.Left
            and Enum_Battle.Orientation.Right or Enum_Battle.Orientation.Left
    blackBoard._orientation = new_orientation
    local data = {uid = blackBoard._uid,orientation = new_orientation}
    EventManager:Dispatch_battle(EventType.Event_Battle_Render_Turn,data)
    return Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
end

return bt_ac_turn
